text: The nineteenth edition of the South American Championship in football was held in Buenos Aires, Argentina from 12 January to 10 February. This tournament, an extra edition with no trophy handed to the winners, is considered official by CONMEBOL. The participating countries were Argentina, Brazil, Bolivia, Chile, Paraguay, and Uruguay. Colombia, Ecuador, and Peru withdrew from the tournament. ==Venues== Buenos Aires Buenos Aires Avellaneda Estadio Monumental Estadio Gasómetro de Boedo Estadio Independiente Capacity: 67,664 Capacity: 75,000 Capacity: 57.858 ==Final round== Each team played against each of the other teams. Two points were awarded for a win, one point for a draw and zero points for a defeat.
